extension.name: Field: Multilingual Text Box
extension.description: The multilingual version of Textbox field.

releases.release: * Make sure localized handles are updated too
* Fixes for PHP 7 support * Fix casing in SQL and PHP keywords * Fix errors in error handling
* To make sure we can alter the handle column without error, drop its key first
* Make sure we check if unique handle option is enabled or not * Allow handle to be 1023 chars long, instead of 255
* Make sure consolidate value does not end up in config.php
* Add missing `handle_unique` column on install
* Add some unique keys
* Add PHP 7 support * Code formatting to PSR-2
* Fixed a bug where assets were not loaded
* Fixed a bug where handles could be bigger than 255 chars
* Added a title to hint about default value
* Updated compatibility info
* Make sure the where clause does not get lost if we do not have a valid language * Remove obsolete css import
* Validate that there are languages before converting * Make sure the user gets notified in case of error
* Removed confusing required checkbox
* Added more support for showing the right language in the backend * Added support for the multilingual_selectbox_link_field extension
* Fixed a bug in the field settings with required languages
* Made the `entry_id` column unique * Fixed issue with display in entries table checkbox * Fixed SQL query when no lang is available
* Added "Convert textbox to multingual" feature (Symphony 2.6.x compatible only)
* Improved optional support * Improved publish display of optional values * Marked as 2.6 compatible
* Fixed a regression bug where the "display in entries table" checkbox was missing.
* Marked as 2.5 compatible
* Added update on per language basis.
* Fixed query.
* Add language code to output element.

* Allow textarea to be resized only on vertical axis. * Added language code to error message. Useful to process automatically in frontend forms. * Fixed `Default to main language` feature. * Ability to chose required languages.
* Added 2 new ouput modes that supply information for all languages.
* Complete rewrite. * Symphony 2.3 compatibility. * Depends on Frontend Localisation * It now extends Textbox Field, benefitting from all goodies. * No compatible with Language Redirect.
- Add an option to the fields definition to set if field has to show the values of default language when the value of selected language is empty.

- Requires Language Redirect 1.0.2 or higher - Use the standard Multilingual class from Language Redirect 1.0.2 - Add option to enable / disable the generation of unique handles for single line fields. - Bug fix in character counter.
- Added full support for frontend submit (create/update).
- Symphony 2.2 compatibility - Language Redirect 1.0.1 compatibility

- Add multilingual handles to work with localized URL params - Add compatibility with tinyMCE formatter - Add compatibility with Publish Filtering extension by Nick Dunn(http://github.com/nickdunn/publishfiltering)
